name: Heavenly Beyond
description:
"Are you leaving, too?"
"No. I'll follow you anywhere, to the moon, to the stars, or beyond heaven."

Heavenly Beyond is a Touhou-inspired bullet hell. Play as Aria, our young heroine, and take to the stars to bring back her brother and fulfill her promise. Weave through intricate patterns of attacks, defeat the boss, and save her brother.

Note: this is not an easy game. It's fair, but it's challenging. Don't expect to get it on your first try, or the next one, or the one after that.
Made in 1 week for Brackeys Jam 2021.2 "Let There Be Chaos".

Features:

  • Difficult, action-packed gameplay
  • Fully Original Art and Soundtrack

Note: Fullscreen not supported by WebGL. Retry also not supported by WebGL. If you want to play again, refresh the page.

Developed solo by Neia. Thanks to Brackeys for hosting the jam, I had a lot of fun.
